Store Fast Food WordPress Restaurant Theme
May 12th, 2011 | 0 Comments Tweet
This is an ecommerce templates, is designed to fast-food shops built on wordpress online stores. store wordpress themes suitable for the restaurant's website. You are completely comfortable using the store fast food restaurant wordpress theme to build your restaurants website.
Topic
WordPress Restaurant Themes
Theme Features
Four detailed color schemes Fully customizable front page Custom Control Panel Auto-resizing product images Excellent Support Theme Guide&Tutorials PSD File Included with developer version Drop Down&Breadcrumb Navigation Gravatar Support&Threaded Comments Built-in Ad Monetization Search Engine Optimized Widget Ready with custom widgets Valid, Cross browser compatible
Price: Standard license $65.00 Developer license $99.00
